alert.note: Alert for Northern Carroll; Northern Coos; Northern Grafton; Southern Carroll; Southern Coos; Southern Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 25 at 3:07PM EST until January 26 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW AND MIXED PRECIPITATION THIS EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations between 6 and 12 inches and ice accumulations up to two tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of south central, southwest, west central, and western Maine. Portions of northern New Hampshire. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 3 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Significant snowfall and periods of heavy snowfall rates will combine with low visibility to create very dangerous driving conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
